question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
For each of the following statements, please indicate whether you agree or disagree with them, and how strongly.
I believe that a job well done is a reward in itself.
Even in this fast-changing world, sincerity, hard work and integrity continue to be the golden keys to success in one’s work life.
I consider my occupational career to be one of the most important activities in my life.
I believe that a person is known in society by the work he does.
I feel a moral obligation to give a full day’s work for a full day’s pay.
I welcome jobs that involve greater responsibility and challenge as they contribute to my learning and growth.
I believe that one should never be late for work unless there is some real emergency.
I believe that work provides a powerful channel to express one’s knowledge, ability and creativity.
I believe that one’s work provides the best source of achieving perfection in life.
Even if I don’t have to work to earn a living, I would still prefer to continue working.
Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
